tuv.seg: National Library of Ireland
Leabharlann Náisiúnta na hÉireann
The National Library of Ireland, which was established in 1877, houses the country's collection of literary and illustrative works of Irish interest
Is i Leabharlann Náisiúnta na hÉireann, a bunaíodh in 1877, atá bailiúchán na tíre de shaothair liteartha agus léirithe is díol spéise Éireannaí
The aim of the Library is to collect, conserve, and present these works, which include collections of printed books, periodicals, manuscripts, prints and drawings, photographs and maps

Is í aidhm na Leabharlainne na saothair seo a bhailiú, a chaomhnú agus a chur i láthair, lena n-áirítear bailiúcháin de leabhair chlóbhuailte, tréimhseacháin, lámhscríbhinní, priontaí agus tarraingtí, grianghraif agus léarscáileanna

The Library's collections of books, manuscripts, prints and drawings, maps, photographs, newspapers, music, ephemera and genealogical material comprises the most comprehensive collection of Irish documentary material in the world

Is é an bailiúchán de leabhair chlóbhuailte, lámhscríbhinní, priontaí agus tarraingtí, grianghraif agus léarscáileanna, nuachtáin, ceol, ábhar gearrshaolach agus seanchais an bailiúchán is cuimsithí de cháipéisí Éireannacha ar domhan
From its foundation, the Library has endeavored to collect all material of Irish interest or Irish origin published through the ages and throughout the world
Ó bunaíodh í, tá an Leabharlann meáite ar an uile ábhar is díol spéise Éireannaí nó de bhunadh na hÉireann a foilsíodh i rith na n-aoiseanna agus ar fud an domhain a bhailiú
It is a legal deposit library of all works published in Ireland
Leabharlann taisce dlithiúla atá inti den uile shaothar a foilsíodh in Éirinn
The Genealogical Office, the Office of the Chief Herald in Kildare Street, and the National Photographic Archive in Temple Bar are all part of the National Library
Cuid den Leabharlann Náisiúnta iad an Oifig Ginealais, Oifig Phríomh-Aralt na hÉireann i Sráid Chill Dara, mar aon leis an gCartlann Náisiúnta Ghrianghrafadóireachta i mBarra an Teampaill
The Library does not lend books and reading is done in the various reading rooms
Ní thugann an Leabharlann leabhair ar iasacht agus déantar na leabhair a léamh sna seomraí éagsúla léimh
It's printed collections include:
I measc a bailiúcháin chlóbhuailte tá:

The Manuscripts collection contains a large and varied collection of manuscripts, of which the main components are Gaelic manuscripts, landed estate archives, maps, political material, and literary papers

Tá bailiúchán mór agus éagsúil de lamhscríbhinní sa bhailiúchán lámhscríbhinní agus is lámhscríbhinní na Gaeilge, cartlanna um eastáit talún, léarscáileanna, ábhar polaitiúil, agus páipéir liteartha den fhormhór atá ann
The Manuscripts Reading Room is at 2/3 Kildare Street
Tá Seomra Léimh na Lámhscríbhinní lonnaithe ag 2/3 Sráid Chill Dara
Its visual collections consist of:
I measc a bhailiúchán amhairc tá:
The Library also makes resources digitally available
Ina theannta sin, cuireann an Leabharlann fáil dhigiteach ar acmhainní
The Library's Genealogy Service is designed to assist all of those who wish to research their family history in Ireland
Tá Seirbhís Ginealais na Leabharlainne in ainm is cabhrú leo siúd uile ar mian leo taighde a dhéanamh ar stair a dteaghlaigh in Éirinn
The Service is freely available to all personal callers to the Library
Tá an tSeirbhís ar fáil go neamhshrianta don uile dhuine a bhuaileann isteach chuig an Leabharlann

For first time researchers the Genealogy Service is an ideal starting point, allowing them the opportunity to discuss their research with experienced genealogists and Library staff, ready access to important finding aids and useful information panels

I gcás taighdeoirí céaduaire, pointe iontach tosaithe is í an tSeirbhís Ginealais, áit a ligeann dóibh plé a dhéanamh ar a dtaighde le gineolaithe ag a bhfuil taithí fhairsing agus le foireann na Leabharlainne, mar aon le rochtain gan stró ar áiseanna tábhachtacha cuardaigh agus ar phainéil úsáideacha faisnéise
More experienced family historians are also welcome to avail of the Service as, from time to time, they may need assistance with on-going research

Ina theannta sin, cuirtear fáilte roimh staraithe teaghlaigh ag a bhfuil taithí níos fairsinge le leas a bhaint as an tSeirbhís, ó thráth go tráth, de bharr go dtarlódh go dteastódh cúnamh uathu le taighde atá ar bun acu
Office of the Chief Herald of Ireland
Oifig Phríomh-Aralt na hÉireann
The Chief Herald of Ireland is the State authority on heraldic matters
Is é Príomh-Aralt na hÉireann an t-údarás Stáit a phléann le hábhair araltais
The functions of the office are the granting and confirming of coats of arms to individuals and corporate bodies
Is iad feidhmeanna na hoifige deonú agus deimhniú armas do dhaoine agus do chomhlachtaí corparáideacha
All arms granted are recorded in the Register of Arms which can be viewed by application through the Manuscripts Reading Room of the National Library
Déantar an uile armas a chur i dtaifead sa Chlár Armas, ar féidir é a fheiceáil ar iarratas trí Sheomra Léimh Lámhscríbhinní na Leabharlainne Náisiúnta
A copying service is offered by the Library
Cuireann an Leabharlann seirbhís cóipeála ar fáil
There are also a range of self-service copying facilities available to readers
Sa mhullach air sin, tá fáil ar réimse d’áiseanna cóipeála féinfhreastail do léitheoirí
The National Library mounts exhibitions of material from its collections
Cuireann an Leabharlann Náisiúnta taispeántais ábhar óna bailiúcháin ar taispeáint
It also has a number of travelling exhibitions available for loan
Anuas air sin, tá aici líon taispeántais taistil ar a bhfuil fáil ar iasacht
Information on current exhibitions is available on it's website
Tá faisnéis faoi thaispeántais reatha ar fáil ar láithreán gréasáin na Leabharlainne
The Library hosts a wide variety of events including public lectures, poetry and music recitals, theatre, children's storytelling and creative workshops
Cuireann an Leabharlann réimse fairsing imeachtaí ar bun, lena n-áirítear léachtanna, ceadail filíochta agus cheoil, amharclannaíochta, seanchas do leanaí agus ceardlanna cruthaitheacha poiblí
More information on events is available here
Tá fáil ar thuilleadh faisnéise faoi imeachtaí anseo
The National Photographic Archive is located in Meeting House Square in Temple Bar
Tá an Chartlann Náisiúnta Ghriangrafadóireachta lonnaithe i gCearnóg Theach an Tionóil i mBarra an Teampaill
It houses a regular programme of exhibitions based on the Library’s photographic collections
Tá sa Chartlann clár rialta de thaispeántais atá bunaithe ar bhailiúcháin ghriangrafadóireachta na Leabharlainne
The National Library provides a number of tours of the library each week
Cuireann an Leabharlann Náisiúnta líon tuaras den Leabharlann ar fáil gach seachtain
No booking is required
Ní gá rud ar bith a chur in áirithe
The Main Reading Room and the Manuscripts Reading Room are open from:
Tá an Príomhsheomra Léimh agus Seomra Léimh na Lámhscríbhinní ar oscailt:
• 9.30 am to 7.45 pm, Monday to Wednesday
• Idir 9.30r.n. agus 7.45i.n., ó Luan go Céadaoin
• 9.30 am to 12.45 pm on Saturday
agus 4.45i.n., ó Dhéardaoin go hAoine • 9.30r.n
Further information on opening hours is available here
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi uaireanta oscailte ar fáil anseo
You will need to present a Reader's Ticket to access all collections in the Library, with the exception of the Newspaper Section, which offers a one-day pass
Beidh ort Ticéad Léitheora a thaispeáint le rochtain a fháil ar an uile bhailiúchán sa Leabharlann, seachas an Rannóg Nuachtán, a chuireann pas aon lae ar fáil
Admission to the Library and the National Photographic Archive is free
Tá cead isteach chuig an Leabharlann agus chuig an gCartlann Náisiúnta Ghrianghrafadóireachta saor in aisce
Admission to the Library's exhibitions is free
Tá cead isteach chuig taispeántais na Leabharlainne saor in aisce
Information on the cost of copying services is available here
Tá fáil ar fhaisnéis faoi chostas seirbhísí cóipeála ar fáil anseo
You can apply for a Reader's Ticket in the Main Reading Room
Is féidir leat iarratas a chur isteach ar Thicéad Léitheora sa Phríomhsheomra Léimh
You will need to bring with you some current photographic identification
Beidh gá duit aitheantas reatha griangraif a thabhairt leat
Find out more about Reader's Tickets here
Faigh amach níos mó faisnéise faoi Thicéid Léitheora anseo
The National Library can make photocopies, printouts, digital images and prints of items in its Collection
Is féidir leis an Leabharlann Náisiúnta fotachóipeanna, asphriontálacha, íomhánna digiteacha agus priontálacha a dhéanamh d’earraí atá ina Bailiúchán
Find out more about ordering copies here
Faigh amach níos mó faisnéise faoi chóipeanna a ordú anseo
